alert.note: Alert for Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 3:49PM CDT until March 30 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MISSISSIPPI AND WEST CENTRAL TIPTON COUNTIES... At 348 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Joiner to near Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Osceola, Wilson, Keiser, Joiner, Dyess, Bassett, Marie, Evadale, Driver, Grider, Golden Lake, Carson Lake, Rotan, Chelford, Norden, Chilson, Randolph, Frenchmans Bayou, Hilton and Shippen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
